content: {"name": "Philadelphia Corporation For Aging (PCA)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Use this form to request more information about the PCA services that may be available to you or a loved one. Please indicate your preferred method of contact and a member of our Helpline team will reach out to you within two business days. If you are a medical or aging network professional making a referral for PCA services on behalf of an older adult patient or client, please use the https://www.pcacares.org/request-assistance/\nIf you have any questions, please call the Helpline at 215-765-9040.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.pcacares.org/services/help-in-the-home/home-delivered-meals/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "642 North Broad Street", "address_2": null, "city": "North Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19130", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9656259, "longitude": -75.16137839999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 765-9000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "An eligibility assessment is completed by a caseworker."}]}
